GSP33nysu__3u:975: sādhanasya sādhyena vyāptatve sati tena vibhinnāśrayatvaṃ kathameva hi dūṣaṇam /

GSP33nysu__3u:991: kintu dṛṣṭaṃ ca vyadhikaraṇasyāpi vyāptyādisampattimataḥ sādhakatvamityāha- rohiṇīti //

GSP33nysu__3u:1002: treveha rohiṇyāḥ kṛttikāyā vā dvau dharmau sampādayituṃ śakyau /

GSP33nysu__3u:1029: viparītājñayā satpratipakṣatā ca syāditi hi śabdārthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:1054: dhūma eva dhūmatvena mūle 'gnimānsādhyata iti cet /

GSP33nysu__3u:1075: tathā kṛttikodayo vyadhikaraṇayaiva rohiṇyudayāsattyā vyāpta iti tau tathaiva gamayati /

GSP33nysu__3u:1094: evamasanna bhavatītyuktyā dvau nañau prakṛtamarthaṃ sātiśayaṃ gamayata iti sattvaṃ labhyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:1096: tadevaṃ viśvaṃ sadasatoḥ sakāśādanyat sadasacca na bhavatītyeṣā pratijñā svavyāhatereva amā('pramā)
GSP33nysu__3u:1100: svavyāhatirhi me mātā vandhyetyādau dūṣaṇatvena sampratipannā /
GSP33nysu__3u:1103: naca doṣāntarāsaṅkīrṇaṃ sādhyaviśeṣaṇāsiddherudāharaṇaṃ paśyāmo yena doṣatvaṃ pratīmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:1104: kasyacidasādhāraṇadharmeṇa śaśaviṣāṇādimattvasādhanamapi pramāṇaṃ kinna syāditi cenna /
GSP33nysu__3u:1106: atīndriyasaṃsagarsādhane na ko 'pi doṣa iti cenna /

GSP33nysu__3u:1117: na cettata evānumānaṃ duṣyaṃ kiṃ sādhyaviśeṣaṇāprasiddhayā /
GSP33nysu__3u:1118: yadi vyāptyādikaṃ vidyate tadāsiddhasādhane ko doṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:1122: yadi dharmī vā hetostaddharmatvaṃ vā na syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:1124: yadi dharmī vā hetostaddharmatvaṃ vā na syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:1127: yadā hi yo dhūmavānasāvagnimāniti gṛhītavyāptiko giriśekhare dhūmaṃ paśyanvyāptiṃ smarati /
GSP33nysu__3u:1133: yena yanmayā kartavyaṃ tadanyena kṛtamiti paryālocyodāsīta /
GSP33nysu__3u:1134: nāpi chinne chidāyā iva paricchinne paricchedāntarotpādo 'yuktaḥ(vaktuṃ na śakyaḥ) /
GSP33nysu__3u:1137: ata eva siddhasādhako 'saṅgata eva nāśrayāsiddha ityuktam /
GSP33nysu__3u:1142: tasmātsandigdhasādhyaḥ pakṣa ityādyāḥ prācāṃ vācaḥ sambhāvanābhiprāyāḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:1147: vyāptiśca vyatirekeṇa tatra taiścaiva gamyate // MAnuv_3,2.25ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:1155: vyatirekeṇa sādhyābhāvasya sādhanābhāvavyāptatvena liṅgenāvagamyate ca sā /
GSP33nysu__3u:1173: ataḥ (pra)śithilamūlaḥ prasaṅgaḥ vyatirekiṇaḥ kva vyāptiḥ kena cāvagamyata iti cet /
GSP33nysu__3u:1178: na kevalaṃ kevalavyatirekisādhanasya sādhyena vyāptirvyatirekeṇa tadavagamaścāsmābhirevāṅgīkriyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:1182: yadi sādhyenāsya kvacidapyanvayo nāsti tadā viruddha evāyamityāśaṅkaya nopeyatvamanvayasya vyāsedhāmo 'pi tūpā(yami)
GSP33nysu__3u:1186: tathā cāprasiddhaviśeṣaṇasyāpi kevalavyatirekiṇo vyāptyupapādanamaprasiddhaviśeṣaṇatve vyāptyapratītiprasañjanaṃ ca kathaṃ na vyāhatamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:1188: yaduktaṃ kevalavyatirekiṇo vyāptyavagamātparairabhyupagamācca nāprasiddhaviśeṣaṇatve 'pi vyāptyavagamātparairabhyupagamācca nāprasiddhaviśeṣaṇatve 'pi vyāptyanavagatiriti /
GSP33nysu__3u:1194: (ya)tathā gandhavattvena bhuvo 'nyabhedasādhane yadyadasādhāraṇadharmavattattato bhidyate yathā abādīti /
GSP33nysu__3u:1195: evamīśvarasya sarvakartṛtvena sārvajñasādhane yo yasya kartā sa tasya kāraṇaṃ prayojanaṃ ca jānāti /
GSP33nysu__3u:1197_1: sati guṇatvādityādau yo yadvṛttau bādhakopapannatve sati guṇaḥ sa tato 'nyadravyavṛttiryathā
GSP33nysu__3u:1198: yadvā sāmānyato viśeṣaṇaprasiddhiṃ vidhāya kevalavyatirekī prayoktavyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:1199: yathā jñānatāratamyaṃ kvacidviśrāntaṃ tāratamyatvādityanena sāmānyataḥ sārvajñasiddhau tasyeśvarasambandhaḥ kevalavyatirekiṇā sādhyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:1201: yaścecchādīnāmāśrayaḥ sa evātmeti sāmānyenātmasiddhau tatsambandho jīvaccharīrasya kevalavyatirekiṇā sādhyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:1204: yathā pṛthivī itarebhyo bhidyate pṛthivītvānna yadevaṃ na tadevaṃ yathā jalādītyatra ghaṭādāveva viśeṣaṇaprasiddhernāprasiddhaviśeṣaṇatā /
GSP33nysu__3u:1210: bhāve hi pratipādye vyatirekavyāptau tadabhāvasya pratiyogipratītisāpekṣatayā viśeṣaṇaprasiddhayapekṣā /
GSP33nysu__3u:1220: liṅgasyoktau viśeṣo 'yaṃ kena mānena gamyate // MAnuv_3,2.25c-f //
GSP33nysu__3u:1224: bhavedetadyadyayaṃ kevalavyatirekiṇyuktiviśeṣaḥ kārya ityatra niyāmakaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:1227: kimanenoktiviśeṣeṇa kevalavyatirekisādhyamanvayitāṃ nīyata uta neti vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:1234: yadyuktiviśeṣaṇāpi liṅgaṃ kevalavyatirekisādhyasādhakameva nānvayitāmāpadyata itīṣyata iti yāvat /
GSP33nysu__3u:1235: tadāyamuktau viśeṣaḥ kena mānena kartavyatayā jñāyate na kenāpi /
GSP33nysu__3u:1236: ato 'prasiddhaviśeṣaṇa eva kevalavyatirekī sādhakaśceti nāprasiddhaviśeṣaṇatvasya doṣatvamiti /
GSP33nysu__3u:1243: ataḥ sādhyavyatirekasya sādhanavyatirekeṇa vipakṣe vyāptiṃ pradarśyopapādanīyā /
GSP33nysu__3u:1252: etaistūktiviśeṣaiḥ kathañcitpratiyoginaḥ sādhyadharmasya buddhisthatāyāṃ sukaro vyāptigrahaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:1254: pratijñāvākyaṃ caivamaviditapadārthakaṃ na prasajyata ityata āha- sādhanamiti //
GSP33nysu__3u:1262: yaḥ paramāṇvādikamabhyupaiti taṃ prati tatsadbhāvaḥ sādhyate,
GSP33nysu__3u:1263: uta na santi paramāṇava iti tadabhāvamabhyupagacchantaṃ prati /
GSP33nysu__3u:1266: dvitīye tvabuddhayārūḍhasya paramāṇvādeḥ sādhanāya kathaṃ vādinaḥ prayatnaḥ kathaṃ ca tadabhāvaṃ paro manyeta /
GSP33nysu__3u:1269: sāmānyato dṛṣṭasvārthānumānena vā svayamavagataṃ paramāṇvādikaṃ vādinā śakyata eva sādhayitum /
GSP33nysu__3u:1272: nahi pramāṇenaiva pratiyogī jñātavya iti niyamo 'sti śaśaviṣāṇādyabhāvapratītyānupapattiprasaṅgāditi /
GSP33nysu__3u:1277: ṇau dharmāvekatropalabdhavatastato 'nyatra savartrāpi tadabhāvopalambhasambhave vyatirekavyāptigrahastāvadvādinaḥ sukara eva /
GSP33nysu__3u:1280: tathāca prāguktarītyānvayasamarthanena aprasiddhasādhyasādhane sambhavati kimetābhiḥ kliṣyakalpanābhiḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:1290: yābhidhānādinā sādhanaṃ kāryamiti niyāmakaṃ (mānaṃ vā) nāsti /
GSP33nysu__3u:1297: anena viśiṣyavyatirekamāśritya yā mahāvidyādivakrarītiḥ sāpyapāstā veditavyā /
GSP33nysu__3u:1300: pakṣadharmatvaṃ sapakṣe sattvaṃ vipakṣādvayāvṛttirabādhitaviṣayatvamasatpratipakṣatvaṃ ceti pañcarūpopapannaṃ khalvanumānaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__3u:1320: na khalu ko 'pi vādī pariśeṣādīnanādṛtya parīkṣāyāṃ pravṛtto 'sti /

GSP33nysu__3u:1330: yat yasya kāryaṃ pramitaṃ pareṇāṅgīkṛtaṃ vā tasya tatkāryatāmaṅgīkurvāṇaṃ prati mithaḥsiddhirucyate /

GSP33nysu__3u:1363: yathā siddhapraśnādau na vādakathāvasitirbhavet kintu tattvanirṇayavirodhitvādudbhāvya tyājanīyameva /

GSP33nysu__3u:1385: dṛṣṭāntadoṣā nāma na santi teṣāṃ yathāyogaṃ hetudoṣeṣvevāntarbhūtatvāditi /
GSP33nysu__3u:1402: sambhavamātreṇa pṛthagvacane 'naikāntikakālatītatvaṃ nāma hetvābhāsāntaraṃ vācyaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:1405: yadvā dṛṣṭāntasya sādhyasādhanavaikalyamapi vyabhicārāsivadubhayānyatararītyā dvividhaṃ pratipattavya na punarekavidhameva /
GSP33nysu__3u:1412: viśeṣaṇe datte sati yadvaiyarthyaṃ viśeṣyasya viśeṣaṇasya vā tadapi hetordūṣaṇameva /
GSP33nysu__3u:1426: nahi viśeṣaṇamātraṃ viśeṣyamātraṃ vā heturyena tadasiddhirhetordūṣaṇaṃ syādityeke /
GSP33nysu__3u:1435: ekābhāve cetyādyanuktvaikāsiddhau ceti vacanamasiddhiśca dvividhā svarūpatājñānataśceti sūcanārtham /
GSP33nysu__3u:1438: yaduktaṃ praśnadoṣāścatvāra iti tatra vaiphalyasyāsaṅgateśca doṣatvamayuktam /
GSP33nysu__3u:1440: tathāhi śabdo 'nityo 'smadādibāhyendriyagrāhyatvāditi prayukte paraḥ pṛcchati sāmānyaṃ nityamanityaṃ veti /
GSP33nysu__3u:1443: tatraiva prayoge paraḥ pṛcchati sāmānyamanugatadaṃ na veti /
GSP33nysu__3u:1445: anugatatvena nityatvaṃ prasādhya tatrānaikāntikatvaṃ vakṣyāmītyevamupodghātalakṣaṇāyāḥ saṅgaterapi pareṇābhipretamucitatvāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:1451: tathāpi prathamapraśne sambhāvitā dūṣaṇatvenodbhāvayituṃ śakyata eva /
GSP33nysu__3u:1453: anenaiva nyāyenāsaṅgatirapi sarvathā saṅgatyanupalambha evodbhāvyeti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:1464: tatra jīvato gṛhābhāvasyānupapadyamānatā nāma kiṃ sarvathāsambhavaḥ kiṃ bahirbhāvena vinānavasthānam /
GSP33nysu__3u:1465: ādye dahanaśaityamapyanumānābhāsātpratītaṃ kiṃ kamapyarthaṃ na bodhayet /

GSP33nysu__3u:1473: virodho hi tadā syādyadi jīvatītyasya gṛhe 'stītyarthaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:1474: yadi vā gṛhe nāstītyasya na jīvatītyarthaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:1478: śikṣito na jātu gṛhānnirgacchati so 'nyānapi tathā manyamāno jīvanapramāṇasya gṛhe sattvamevārthaṃ pratipādyata iti /
GSP33nysu__3u:1479: evaṃ tarhi sandihāno 'vatiṣṭheta na tu bahirbhāvaṃ niścinuyāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:1483: anumānatvapakṣe kiṃ bahirbhāve jīvanamātraṃ liṅgamuta gṛhābhāvamātram athavā viśiṣyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:1496: yathā gāmanubhūya vanaṃ gato gavaye gosādṛśyamupalabhya gavi gavayasādṛśyaṃ pratyeti /
GSP33nysu__3u:1502: tathāpi yo yatsadṛśaḥ sa tatsadṛśa iti vyāptibalena gamakatvādanumānameva /
GSP33nysu__3u:1508: atideśavākyārthaśca kvacitsādharmyaṃ kvacidvaidharmyaṃ kvaciddharmamātramiti trividho bhavati /
GSP33nysu__3u:1510: gavaye pratyabhijñānam gavayapadaṃ smaran gavayapadasya gavaye saṅgatimavagacchati /
GSP33nysu__3u:1512: vaidharmyopamānaṃ tu gavādivaddviśapho na bhavatyaśva iti vākyārthapratyabhijñānādaśve 'śvapadasaṅgatigrahaṇam /
GSP33nysu__3u:1514: tatra yadyapi saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandhapratipattiḥ prāggavayādidarśanādatideśavākyena prayogādinā liṅgena vā bhavituṃ nārhati /
GSP33nysu__3u:1518: yathā hi pṛthivītvābhisambandhātpṛthivīti vyavahartavyeti śrutavataḥ pṛthivītvābhisambandhaṃ kvaciddravye paśyato 'numānenaiva saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandhapratipattirabhyupagatā /
GSP33nysu__3u:1519: tathā prakṛte 'pīti kathamidaṃ pṛthak pramāṇaṃ syāditi /
GSP33nysu__3u:1529: kiṃ tarhi pratyakṣayogyārthānāṃ sarveṣāmapyabhāvaḥ pramāṇadvayavedya ityata āha- sukhāderiti //
GSP33nysu__3u:1533: sukhāderāntarasya sākṣivedyasyābhāvastu niyamena sākṣipratyakṣeṇaiva grāhya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:1537: anena bāhyānāṃ pratyakṣayogyānāṃ ghaṭādīnāmabhāvaḥ pratyakṣānumānavedya ityuktam /
GSP33nysu__3u:1564: nanu ca prātaścatvarādau pratiyogismaraṇābhāvena gajādyabhāvaṃmananubhūya deśāntaraṃ gato gajasmṛtimānprātaścatvare gajo nāsīditi pratipadyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:1565: na tatra pratyakṣasyāvakāśa ityanupalabdhilakṣaṇaṃ pṛthak pramāṇaṃ tatrāṅgīkāryamiti /
GSP33nysu__3u:1569: ata eva tatra kṣaṇaṃ dhyātvā nāsīccatvare gaja iti pratipadyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:1574: tathāpyupakramopasaṃhārāvabhyāsāpūvartāphalārthavādāḥ pramāṇāni santīti kathaṃ tattritvaniyama ityata āha- prārambhādyāśceti //
GSP33nysu__3u:1582: yo yatra prārabhyate sa tatra pratipādya ityādirūpāṃ vyāptimapekṣamāṇā evāgamārthāvasityarthā bhavantyato yuktaya evetyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:1584: upakramādyā āgamaviṣayā eva na cārthāpattyupamābhāvā iti yogavibhāgaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:1587: vākyaṃ prakaraṇaṃ sthānaṃ samākhyā ca tathāvidhāḥ // MAnuv_3,2.34ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:1590: upakramādīnāmuttarottaraṃ prābalyaṃ vākyādīnāṃ tu pūrvapūrvamiti jñāpanāya yogavibhāgaḥ
GSP33nysu__3u:1595: tathā“śrutirliṅgaṃ samākhyā ca vākyaṃ prakaraṇaṃ tathā';
GSP33nysu__3u:1602: ityādau kurubhyaḥ pṛthagvacanaṃ tathā teṣāmupakramādīnāṃ vākyādīnāṃ cānumānatve 'pyupapatterliṅgācca pṛthagvacanaṃ yuktamityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:1603: nanu tathāpi śākunalipyakṣaraceṣyāsambavaitihyapariśeṣāḥ pṛthak pramāṇāni santīti cet(na) /
GSP33nysu__3u:1625_0: bhūtale ghaṭaḥ kinna syāditi viparītaśaṅkayā kuṇṭhitaśaktikaṃ pratyakṣaṃ na tāvadghaṭābhāvaṃ
GSP33nysu__3u:1626: tarko hi durjana iva parābhilaṣitaṃ vi(vyava)
GSP33nysu__3u:1628: athedānīṃ pratyakṣaṃ sujana iva svaprameyaṃ niścinoti /
GSP33nysu__3u:1630_0: evaṃ kvacidvayabhicāraśaṅkayopādhiśaṅkayā vā dhūmavānapi parvato 'gnimānmā bhūditi
GSP33nysu__3u:1630_1: pakṣe vipakṣaśaṅkayānumāne kuṇṭhite yadi niragnikaḥ syātparvatastadā nirdhūmo 'pi

GSP33nysu__3u:2228: yaduktaṃ sārvajñādermithyātvasiddhaye viśvasya bhrāntikalpitatvaṃ taddūṣayitumīśatajjñānetyādiko granthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:2230: viśvasya bhrāntisiddhatvaṃ vadatā tatra pramāṇaṃ vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:2240: bhrāntirviśvasya yenaiva mānābhāsena kalpyate 'tra hi // MAnuv_3,2.49 //
GSP33nysu__3u:2241: tanmātrasyānyathā bhāvāt kiṃ na syād viśvasatyatā // MAnuv_3,2.50ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:2245: tathāpi ye viśvaṃ pramāṇaprameyapramātṛpramitibhedena caturvidhamācakṣate tannirākaraṇaprastāvanāya pramāṇaprameyapramātṛbhedena trividhameva viśvamiti pratijñātumīśetyādyuktam /
GSP33nysu__3u:2248: tathāpi tasya niyataṃ pramātṛtvamanyeṣāṃ tu viparyayādisambhavādaniyatamityādiviśeṣadyotanāya pṛthaggrahaṇam /
GSP33nysu__3u:2270: viśvaṃ tāvatsvabhāvato bahutvena ca prabalairīśavākyādibhiḥ sarvaiḥ pramāṇaiḥ satyatayāvagatam /
GSP33nysu__3u:2273: vivādapadaṃ mithyā dṛśyatvājjaḍavadityādikaṃ viśvamithyātvānumānaṃ tu svabhāvaikatvābhyāṃ durbalam /
GSP33nysu__3u:2279: yenedaṃ kalpyate bhrāntaṃ bhrāntistasyaiva kiṃ na sā // MAnuv_3,2.50cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:2284: tasyaiva sā kalpanā bhrāntirayathārthā kinna bhavet /
GSP33nysu__3u:2293: gauḍapādādivākyavirodhādīśvarādīnāṃ viśvasatyatvapratītireva bhrāntiḥ kuto na kalpanīyetyata āha- bhaveyuriti //
GSP33nysu__3u:2301: astu tarhi neha nānāstītyādiradvaitaparo vedādirāgamaḥ sarvasyāpi mithyātve pramāṇamiti cenna /
GSP33nysu__3u:2304: pratyakṣaṃ khalu tātkālikaṃ pramāṇaṃ na punarātyantikam /
GSP33nysu__3u:2307: ato balavatā vedena bādhitatvātpratyakṣaprāptamapi viśvasatyatvaṃ bhrāntisiddhamityevāṅgīkartumucitamityata āha- satyatvamiti /
GSP33nysu__3u:2319: na kevalaṃ pratyakṣasya kintvāgamasyāpi prāmāṇyaṃ pratyakṣeṇaiva siddhaṃ na tvanyenetyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:2330: pramāṇānāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ hi na sattāmātreṇa niśśaṅkavyavahārahetuḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:2339: prāmāṇyaṃ ca jñānagrāhakagrāhyamiti svaprāmāṇyaṃ svayameva gṛhṇātīti nānavasthā'padyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:2343: tathāpyuktarītyā prabalenāgamena virodhe durbalasya pratyakṣasya kuto na bādha iti cet /
GSP33nysu__3u:2347: nacobhayaprāmāṇyasya sākṣivedyatve te yujyete ityāśayavānpratyakṣasya tātkālikaṃ prāmāṇyamāgamasyātyantikamiti vibhāgaṃ tāvadapākaroti- tatkālikamiti /
GSP33nysu__3u:2351: yadi sākṣigṛhītamapi viśvasatyatvagrāhiṇo 'kṣajasya prāmāṇyaṃ tātkālikameva bhavettarhyaikyāgamasyāpi prāmāṇyaṃ sākṣigṛhītatvāviśeṣāttātkālikaṃ syādeveti na vibhāgaḥ siddhayati /
GSP33nysu__3u:2361: aikyāgamasyāpi prāmāṇyaṃ yadi tātkālikaṃ svīkriyeta tadā viśvasya satyataiva syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:2362: nanūktamatra pratyakṣamābhāsīkṛtya paścādaikyāgamaprāmāṇyaṃ nivartata iti bhavati tātkālikam,
GSP33nysu__3u:2371: syādidaṃ yadi prāmāṇyasya tātkālikatvaṃ nāmānityatvamiha vivakṣitaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:2375: taccedaikyāgamaprāmāṇyasyābhyupagataṃ tadā kathaṃ viśvasya satyatā na syāditi /
GSP33nysu__3u:2387: ataḥ sākṣivedyatvāviśeṣe 'pyanena viśeṣeṇa pratyakṣaprāmāṇyaṃ sākṣiṇā tātkālikameva gṛhyata iti kalpyata ityata āha- advaiteti //
GSP33nysu__3u:2392: nahi vākyaṃ vā tatprāmāṇyaṃ vā tadartho bhedābhāvo vā brahmeti /
GSP33nysu__3u:2400: yadi svatastvaṃ prāmāṇye viśvasattā kathaṃ na te // MAnuv_3,2.56cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:2404: yadyāgamaprāmāṇyasya svatastvamucyate tadā pratyakṣaprāmāṇyamapi svata eveti brūmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:2407: tathā cāgamaprāmāṇyasya svatastvamaṅgīkurvato yatā tadviṣayasatyatā sammatā tathā svataḥpramāṇapratyakṣaviṣayaviśvasattā(tyatā)
GSP33nysu__3u:2412: yatpratyakṣaṃ tātkālikameva jñānasya prāmāṇyaṃ janayati vākyantvātyantikam /
GSP33nysu__3u:2413: tathā jñānagrāhakaḥ sākṣī pratyakṣajñānasya tātkālikameva prāmāṇyaṃ gṛhṇāti vākyajanyajñānasya tvātyantikamiti /
GSP33nysu__3u:2417: prāmāṇyasya ca maryādā kālato vyāhatā bhavet // MAnuv_3,2.57ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:2429: tatra yadi ca pratyakṣaṃ kālāntare 'pi bādhitaprāmāṇyaṃ syāttarhīdānīṃ tasya mānatāstīti kutaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:2430: kālatrayasattāniṣedharūpatvādbādhasya yadi ca pratyakṣaprāmāṇyamidānīṃ satsyātkathaṃ kālāntare 'pi tarhi bādhyeteti vyāhatameva tātkālikatvavacanam /
GSP33nysu__3u:2438: mithyātvamānaṃ mokṣe 'pi mānaṃ kiṃ neti bhaṇyatām // MAnuv_3,2.58ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:2449: abādhitasvarūpaprāmāṇyapakṣe tenaiva saddvitīyatvādadvaitahāniḥ syādityuktalakṣaṇo mokṣo na siddhayet /
GSP33nysu__3u:2454: viśvamithyātvamānasya tatprāmāṇyasya ca bādhyatvapakṣe 'pi mokṣo na siddhayati /
GSP33nysu__3u:2456: viśvasya punarāpattirmithyāmānaṃ yadā na mā // MAnuv_3,2.59ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:2458: viśvamithyātvamānaṃ yadā na mā bādhitasvarūpaprāmāṇyaṃ syāttadā viśvasya punarāpattiḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:2481: avidyādhvaṃsaviśiṣyo na prāksiddho jñānasādhyaśceti cettatkiṃ sa eva muktiḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:2483: tarhi viśiṣyasya sattvābhāvena satī muktirityayuktaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:2510: evameva mukteradvitīyabrahmāvasthānarūpatānirāsāya kāle 'pi vikalpya doṣo 'bhidhātavya ityāha- tathā kāla iti //
GSP33nysu__3u:2513: nanu ca mokṣadaśāyāṃ kālo 'sti na veti vikalpya“asti ceddvaitāpattiḥ';
GSP33nysu__3u:2516: iti kathamatideśa ityata āha- kālādhīnā hīti //
GSP33nysu__3u:2521: na kevalamanumānasiddho mukteḥ kālādhikaraṇatāniyamaḥ kintu“tadā vidvān'“dṛṣṭvaiva taṃ mucyate';
GSP33nysu__3u:2526: kintato yadyevamadhikaraṇena kālena vyāptā muktirityata āha- kāleti //
GSP33nysu__3u:2534: yadi mokṣaḥ kālasambandhī na syāttadā śaśṛṅgādivadasattvāpattiḥ iti /
GSP33nysu__3u:2535: nanu ca“na mumukṣurna vai mukta ityeṣā paramārthatā';
GSP33nysu__3u:2539: caitanyasya sato bandhābhāvalakṣaṇe mokṣe 'sati devadattavanmuktābhimatasyāpi saṃsāritvaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__3u:2540: bandha(sya)mithyātvātsaṃsāro muktiśca na sta eveti cennānaṅgīkṛtatvamevāniṣṭatvaṃ kintvaprāmāṇikatvādikam /
GSP33nysu__3u:2543: tadevamāgamāditaḥ pratyakṣasya daurbalyaṃ nirākurvatā tanmiṣeṇa prābalyaṃ ca vyutpāditam /
GSP33nysu__3u:2556: yadi hi pratyakṣaprāptaṃ kvacidanumānāgamābhyāṃ bādhitamupalabdhavantaḥ tadā pratīmo 'numāditaḥ pratyakṣasya daurbalyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:2562: ityasya vaidikārtaviṣayatvādatra ca pṛthivyādiprapañcasya prastutatvānna virodhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:2565: mama karṇe praviśya gajo garjatītyādivākyasya ca pratyakṣabādhitatvāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:2570: sa ca pratiyogijñānādhīnajñānaḥ pratiyogibhūtaṃ cauṣṇyaṃ tejasyeva pratyakṣeṇa pratyetavyamiti tasyopajīvyatvamiti cenna /
GSP33nysu__3u:2574: yadā ca samastasyāpi tejaso 'nauṣṇyaṃ sādhyate tadā bhavatvidaṃ vyutpādanam /
GSP33nysu__3u:2576: saurādau tejasyuṣṇatāṃ sparśanenopalabhya cakṣuṣopalabdhe 'gnāvanauṣṇyasādhanasya tu svabhāvaprabalenaiva pratyakṣeṇa bādha ityeṣā dik /
GSP33nysu__3u:2584: dehātmatvaṃ pratyakṣataḥ prāptamanumānāgamabādhitaṃ dṛṣṭamiti yadi brūyāttadā tanneti brūma ityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:2587: ... na tat prāptaṃ pratyakṣataḥ kvacit // MAnuv_3,2.61cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:2601: mama deha iti hyeva na deho 'hamiti pramā // MAnuv_3,2.61ef //
GSP33nysu__3u:2603: sarvasyāpi jantormama deha ityeva hi pramā pratītirna tu kasyāpi deho 'hamiti /
GSP33nysu__3u:2604: yadvā yasmātsarveṣāṃ mama deha ityeva pramā samyakpratītiḥ sar(va)
GSP33nysu__3u:2607: sā ca liṅgādyanapekṣaiva jāyamānā pratyakṣajanyaiva bādhyate cānumānādineti saivodāharaṇaṃ bhaviṣyatītyata āha- upacāraśceti //
GSP33nysu__3u:2621: yathā vastrasya kardamalepane sati kṛṣṇaṃ vastramityupacāravyavahāro bhavatyevaṃ prakṛte 'pi syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:2623: yo hi vastrasya śauklayaṃ kardamalepanaṃ ca samyagavagacchati na tasya vastre kāṣṇyarpratītirasti /
GSP33nysu__3u:2630: svataḥ śukle 'pi vastre kardamopādhikakārṣṇyasadbhāvena pratītisambhavāditi cenna /
GSP33nysu__3u:2640: tatra pṛcchāmaḥ kiṃ kardamaḥ śauklayaṃ nivartya kārṣṇyaṃ vastre karoti,
GSP33nysu__3u:2653: atha vastre kardamenevātmani dehopādhinā kṛtaṃ kārṣṇyamastīti pratītisambhāvanā vivakṣitā tatrāha- yadīti //
GSP33nysu__3u:2656: yadi vastra ivātmani dehopādhikṛtaṃ kārṣṇyamastīti tatpratītiḥ sambhāvyate tadā pratyakṣapratītasyānumānādinā bādha ityatra nedamudāharaṇamiti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:2658: svataḥ śuklatvavat kārṣṇyaṃ na mameti pratīyate // MAnuv_3,2.62cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:2679: mama deha iti vyavahārasya mama svarūpamitivadaupacārikatvopapatteḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:2682: tatra saṅghātāpekṣayā dehamātre sambandhapratītirapi na bādhikā /
GSP33nysu__3u:2698: pratyakṣajā ceyaṃ pratītiriti kathaṃ pratyakṣasiddhasya nānumānādinā bādha ityata āha- kathaṃ ceti /
GSP33nysu__3u:2699: kathaṃ ca bhedo dehāderātmano na pramīyate // MAnuv_3,2.63ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:2703: yadā dehāderiti pañcamī tadā'tmana iti ṣaṣṭhī /
GSP33nysu__3u:2704: yadā cātmana iti pañcamī tadā dehāderiti ṣaṣṭhī /
GSP33nysu__3u:2706: dehādisaṅghātasyātmanaścānyonyaṃ bhedastaddharmāṇāṃ ca parasparamasaṃsargaḥ pratīyata evetyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:2708: jātamātrā mṛgā gāvo hastinaḥ pakṣiṇo khaṣāḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:2712: jātā eva na tu vyāpārāntaraṃ kṛtavantaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:2725: asmṛtau pūrvadehasya vijñānaṃ tat kathaṃ bhavet // MAnuv_3,2.64ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:2737: kintu tathā cāyamityanusandhanasya ca vismṛtau satyāṃ vijñānaṃ tatkathaṃ bhavediti sambandhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:2739: asti tāvanmṛgādīnāṃ stanapānādau pravṛttiḥ śaṅkukaṇḍūyanādito nivṛttiśca /
GSP33nysu__3u:2753: yadiṣyasādhanaṃ na bhavati tatstanapānaṃ na bhavati,
GSP33nysu__3u:2762: naceddehāntarasmaraṇaṃ mṛgādīnāṃ tadā tadaviśiṣyānvayayādismaraṇamapi na syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:2780: tathāpi kiṃ prakṛta ityata āha- yadeti //
GSP33nysu__3u:2783: yadaivametaddehavartino mama na kevalamayameva dehaḥ kintu tatprāganyo 'pyabhūditi dehāntarasmaraṇaṃ pramitam(ṇamāpatitam) /
GSP33nysu__3u:2786: kintvanekamaṇiṣvanusyūtaṃ sūtramivānekadehānusyūtamātmānaṃ paśyataḥ svasya tato 'tyantabhedāvasitireva yuktā /
GSP33nysu__3u:2790: ato mama deha iti pratyayo nānyathayitavyaḥ kṛṣṇo 'hamityādiścopacāro 'ṅgīkaraṇīya iti /
GSP33nysu__3u:2794: kintu sādṛśye sambandhe vā prayojane ca sati /
GSP33nysu__3u:2797: kiñca mṛgādīnāṃ pāmārāṇāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ ca yadi dehātmabhedajñānaṃ syāttarhi“naiṣāṃ mamāhamiti dhīḥ śvasṛgālabhakṣya';
GSP33nysu__3u:2800: dehānukūlapratikūlārthayo rāgadveṣau ca dehātmabhedajñāne sati na syātām /
GSP33nysu__3u:2810: svāviviktavat svābhinne svasaṃsṛṣṭe ca yathā tathetyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:2818: rūḍhatvāccaiteṣāṃ vyavahārāṇāṃ na prayojanāpekṣetyāśayena uktam- aṅgāravahnivaditi /
GSP33nysu__3u:2822: viśado hi vivekaḥ puruṣārthāya kalpate na tvautpattikaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:2823: ātmano dehe vyāptatvādatyantaṃ premāspadatvādrāgādayo yujyanta eveti /
GSP33nysu__3u:2825: nanu jñānameva vyavahārakāraṇaṃ taccedasti kathaṃ tarhi vyavahāreṣvapāṭavamityata āha- nahīti //
GSP33nysu__3u:2833: yamalayoratyantavivekaṃ paśyanto 'pi mātrādayaḥ kathametau viviktāvavagantavyāviti pṛṣṭā evamiti svapratyakṣānubhavānusāreṇa na parānpratipādayituṃ kṣamanta ityādyanubhavasiddham /
GSP33nysu__3u:2835: atha tatrātyantasādṛśyaṃ pratibandhakaṃ tarhyatrāpyaṅgāravahnivadātmano dehe vyāptatvaṃ pratibandhakamuktameva /
GSP33nysu__3u:2836: śuktirajatādipratyakṣāṇāmanumānādinā bādho nāstītyanyatropapāditamityāśayavān“kva ca pratyakṣataḥ prāptam';
GSP33nysu__3u:2838: ... tato hi pratyakṣasiddhaṃ nānyena kenacit // MAnuv_3,2.67cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:2847: bhavatvāgamāditaḥ pratyakṣaṃ prabalaṃ mā vā bhūt /
GSP33nysu__3u:2851: āgamādikaṃ khalvāgāminaṃ viśvasya bādhaṃ pratipādayati na tu adhunātanam /
GSP33nysu__3u:2856: tasya vartamānamātragrāhitvena āgāminamapi viśvasya bādhaṃ pratyakṣaṃ pratikṣipet /
GSP33nysu__3u:2863: tathā satīdānīntanaghaṭābhāvagrāhiṇā pratyakṣeṇa bhaviṣyati ghaṭa ityāgamādervirodhaḥ syāditi /
GSP33nysu__3u:2866: asti tāvat pratyakṣaṃ vartamānakālīnaṃ bādhābhāvamāvedayatīti parasyāpi sampratipattiḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:2867: āgamaśca neha nānāstītyādirūpo vartamānameva viśvasya bādhaṃ pratipādayatīti kathaṃ na pratyakṣaviruddhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:2869: sa ca vartamānakālīnasattāgrāhiṇā pratyakṣeṇa viruddhayata eveti tatpratipādakasyāgamādeḥ kathaṃ na pratyakṣavirodhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:2870: etenāsmatpratyakṣamasmanniṣṭhameva bādhaṃ pratikṣeptuṃ kṣamate na puruṣāntaragatamiti nirastam /
GSP33nysu__3u:2895: bhaviṣyati mokṣa ityavagamābhāve ca tadarthaḥ prayatno na syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:2896: mokṣe sarvasya bādho bhaviṣyatītyetadapi na syāditi /
GSP33nysu__3u:2898: śukavāmadevādayo jñānena muktā abhūvannahamapi mukto bhaviṣyāmītyādyavagatiḥ āgamādeva bhaviṣya(tīti)
GSP33nysu__3u:2900: āgamo 'pi hi sāmānye siddhe pratyakṣataḥ punaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:2909: nadyāstīre pañcaphalāni santītyādau tathā darśanāditi hiśabdārthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:2913: yadi padārthāḥ prāṅ na siddhāstarhi padānāṃ teṣu vācakatvaśaktigrahaṇaṃ na syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:2918: atha śaktigraha eva kimartha ityata āha- atīteti //
GSP33nysu__3u:2920: viśeṣaṃ jñāpayed vākyaṃ na tadajñātaśaktike // MAnuv_3,2.70 //
GSP33nysu__3u:2923: akhilamapi vākyaṃ padānāṃ padārtheṣu vācakatvaśaktigrahe jāta evānvayaviśeṣaṃ gamayet /
GSP33nysu__3u:2924: natu tadvākyaṃ padārtheṣu padasamūhe 'jñātaśaktike sati viśeṣaṃ gamayedityanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ,
GSP33nysu__3u:2929: astu śaktigrahāvaśyambhāvaḥ kintu vartamāneṣvevārtheṣu nātītānāgateṣvanupayogādityata āha- śaktiścediti //
GSP33nysu__3u:2933: yadi vartamāna evārthe padānāṃ śaktirgṛhītā syāttadā vākyam atītānāgatam atītānāgatārthasaṃsargaṃ na vadet na pratipādayet /
GSP33nysu__3u:2940: yadi śaktigraho 'nyatra kathaṃ sa syāt tadagrahe // MAnuv_3,2.71cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:2942: vartamānādanyatrātītānāgatayorapi padaśaktigraho yadyaṅgīkṛtastadā saḥ atītānāgatārtheṣu padaśaktigrahastadagrahe 'tītānāgatārthāgrahe kathaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:2947: vākyaṃ tāvatpadārthasaṃsargaviśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ vākyārthameva bodhayati na padārthamātram /

GSP33nysu__3u:3024_2: 'ntyā viśeṣā iti vaktuṃ na śakyata eva /

GSP33nysu__3u:3046_1: vācakatvaśaktigraho yadāṅgīkṛto bhavettadā sa ca śaktigrahastasya svarūpāderjñānaṃ vinā kuto bhavet /

GSP33nysu__3u:3057: sarvamapi vastvasmābhirviśeṣasāmānyarūpaṃ vyāvṛttarūpaṃ sāmānyarūpaṃ ceṣyate 'to na kācidanupapattiḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:3060: yadi vyāvṛttameva syāttadoktaprakāreṇa sārvajñamāpadyeta śaktigrahābhāvo vā syāt /

GSP33nysu__3u:3070: yatprāk svarūpabhedādau sāmānyaṃ nāstītyuktaṃ tatpadārthasvarūpāṇāṃ parasparamanugataikadharmatā nāstītyabhiprāyeṇa /
GSP33nysu__3u:3072: svarūpābhinnasya pratiniyatasya sāmānyākārasyābhyupagame viśeṣasāmānyarūpaṃ sarvamapīṣyata ityuktamiti na pūrvottaravirodhaḥ /

GSP33nysu__3u:3182: tathātve hyahamityeva syānna tu sa iti /

GSP33nysu__3u:5015: yadi bhedo bhedibhyāṃ bhinnastadā so 'pi bhedastathetyanavasthā syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:5020: abhinnatve 'pi vaktavyaṃ saviśeṣābhinna uta nirviśeṣābhinna iti /
GSP33nysu__3u:5026: bheda iva vināpi bhedena viśeṣeṇaivopapattāvapi vṛthā paramparākalpanāyāṃ gauravaṃ syāttato dharmāṇāmeva saviśeṣābhedāṅgīkāraḥ śreyāniti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:5038: bhedo yadi bhedibhyāmabhinno nirviśeṣaśca syāttadā tasya tadbhedatā tayorayaṃ bheda ityevambhāvaḥ kuto na kuto 'pi /
GSP33nysu__3u:5040: tanmātratve ca dharmadharmiṇāveva sto na bheda iti syāt /

GSP33nysu__3u:5045: bhedasya bhedisvarūpatvamaṅgīkṛtya viśeṣamanaṅgīkurvāṇaṃ prati dūṣaṇāntaramāha- aneneti //
GSP33nysu__3u:5047: bheda evaiṣa bahudhā dṛśyate tat kimuttaram // MAnuv_3,2.165 //
GSP33nysu__3u:5050: bhinno 'yaṃ ghaṭa iti sa bheda eva viśeṣato viśeṣaṇatvena dṛśyate na tu ghaṭaḥ,

GSP33nysu__3u:5056: tathāyaṃ padārtho 'nena vakratvenānena koṭaravattvena puruṣādbhinna iti sa eṣa bheda eva viśeṣato vyāvartakadharmeṇa dṛśyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:5058: tathāsmātpaṭādasmātstambhādasmātkuḍyādbhinno 'yaṃ ghaṭa ityeṣa bheda eva saviśeṣataḥ pratiyogiviśeṣasāhityena nimittena bahudhā dṛśyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:5060: ato na bhedo ghaṭasya svarūpamiti yatsvarūpabhedasya dūṣaṇaṃ parairucyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:5063: yadi viśeṣo nāṅgīkriyate tadā bhedo bhedinābhinna ityapi nāṅgīkartuṃ śakyate /

GSP33nysu__3u:5067: tadīyatvena viśeṣaṇatvena sapratiyogitvena liṅgitvena bahutvena ca pratīyamāno 'nyonyābhāvādirūpo bhedo na bhedisvarūpatayāṅgīkriyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:5068: yastu svarūpatayāṅgīkriyate nāsau tadīyatvādinā pratīyata iti tasyottaraṃ brūma iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__3u:5070: anyathā svarūpasyaiva bheda iti pāribhāṣikaṃ nāmāntaramuktaṃ syāt /

GSP33nysu__3u:5101: pratyutāparyāyāvityeva vadati sarva ityaprāmāṇikaṃ pramāṇaviruddhaṃ caitaditi /
GSP33nysu__3u:5104: tathāca bhedābhedaśabdayoḥ paryāyatvaprāptau viśeṣabalenaiva hi tatpariharaṇīyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:5113: yadyapi bhedābhedayoḥ bhedinā ghaṭena sahābhedastathāpi tayoranyonyaṃ bhedo 'stīti na tacchabdayoḥ paryāyatvaṃ prasajyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:5123: viśeṣābhāve bhedo bhedinā eko 'bhinnastathābhidā bhedinā ghaṭenābhinnā,
GSP33nysu__3u:5129: nirvāhārthaṃ ghaṭena saviśeṣa evābhedo 'ṅgīkārya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:5140: tathāca bhedābhedayorghaṭatanmātratvābhāvena parasparaṃ bhedopapatterna śabdayoḥ paryāyatvam /
GSP33nysu__3u:5141: tataśca bhedābhedayoḥ parasparamabhedo viśeṣaścāṅgīkāyar ityasaditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:5142: evamapi dharmadharmiṇorbhedamabhyupagacchatāntato 'bhinne vastuni viśeṣo 'ṅgīrktavya ityabhimataṃ yadyapi siddhameva,

GSP33nysu__3u:8142: etadasmākamapi sammatamityata uktamanyo hiṃsāsahito yajñādirna dharma iti /
GSP33nysu__3u:8151: anumānena vākyena ca jinasyāptatvamavadhāryāptavākyatvānumānena mokṣasādhanaṃ dharmaṃ jñānaṃ ca pratipādayato jinavākyasya prāmāṇyāvadhāraṇaṃ yaduktaṃ tannopapadyata ityarthaḥ /

GSP33nysu__3u:8177: grahavṛdṛniścigamaścetyakartari kārake bhāve vā apo vidhānāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:8200: tat nirdeṣaviṣayasannikṛṣṭanirdeṣendriyatvādikam eteṣāṃ pratyakṣādīnāṃ svarūpaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ hi ityarthaḥ /

GSP33nysu__3u:8250: anyeṣāmapratyakṣe 'rthe 'sya pratyakṣaṃ pravartata ityato na virodha iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__3u:8252: asskhalitavākyaṃ ca kvacidvā prakṛte vā sarvatra vā /

GSP33nysu__3u:8278: yadyapi saptabhaṅginayo 'pi tadukto dūṣitastathāpi mokṣasādhanaṃ yatpudgaladaśarnamuktaṃ tatraiva skhalanapradarśanāyeyamuktiḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:8304: tasmādātmā na sukhātyantābhinna iti jino brūte /

GSP33nysu__3u:8328: sukhasyābhāvatā kena na kenāpi pramāṇena siddhetyarthaḥ /

GSP33nysu__3u:8346: vastutvena sukhasyābhāvatāmanumimānasya mate yadi kaścitpadārtho bhāvo 'pi syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:8350: nanu sarve 'pi padārthā abhāvā bhavantyevati nokto doṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:8356: evaṃ paṭādayo 'pīti dvitīyaṃ śaṅkate- yadi sarve 'pīti //
GSP33nysu__3u:8359: sarve'pi padārthā anyonyābhāvāḥ syuriti yadi manyasa ityarthaḥ /

GSP33nysu__3u:10570: taccaitasya manuṣyasya muktasyaiva yujyate na saṃsāriṇa iti hetoryuvā ca sa mukta eva /

GSP33nysu__3u:10579: tato nirhrāsasya yogyatānusāreṇa pūrṇasyānandasya samprāptyā kāraṇena mukta evāśiṣṭha iti ca gīyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:10584: mukta eva sthitasyānanyathāprāpteḥ atiśayena nirvikāratvāt dṛḍhiṣṭha iti coditaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:10590: ato baliṣṭha iti sa evocyata iti /
GSP33nysu__3u:10592: nanu muktasya“tasyeyaṃ pṛthivī sarvā vittasya pūrṇā syāt';
GSP33nysu__3u:10593: iti vittaparipūrṇapṛthivīpatitvamucyamānaṃ kathaṃ yujyata ityata āha- tasyeti //
GSP33nysu__3u:10597: tatra yuvā syādityādikā muktaṃ pratipādyāmuktavivakṣayā tasyetyādivākyaṃ pravṛttamityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:10606: evaṃ vājasaneyaśrutau“sa yo ha vai manuṣyāṇāmityādeḥ sampannatama ityantasya,
GSP33nysu__3u:10607: taittirīyaśrutau ca yuvā syādityādeḥ pūrṇā syādityantasya';
GSP33nysu__3u:10609_0: ye śataṃ manuṣyāṇāmānandā ityetatsa eko mānuṣa ānandaste ye śataṃ mānuṣā ānandā ityetacca
GSP33nysu__3u:10609_1: muktāmuktaviṣayamiti siddhe taittirīyaśrutigataṃ sa eko manuṣyagandharvāṇāmānandaḥ
GSP33nysu__3u:10610: sa eka iti saṃsāragatamuktavā sukhaṃ punaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:10613: saṃsāragataṃ sukhamuktveti saṃsārimanuṣyasukhācchataguṇaṃ saṃsāriṇo manuṣyagandharvasya sukhamuktvetyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:10616: sa eka iti vākyena śrotriyasyeti vākyena /
GSP33nysu__3u:10618: anenaiva nyāyena te ye śataṃ manuṣyagandharvāṇāmānandā ityādikaṃ vyākhyeyamityāśayavānāha- saṃsāragāditi //
GSP33nysu__3u:10623: saṃsāragatasya devagandharvādeḥ śatādhikaṃ śataguṇādhikaṃ sukhamuktveti vartate /
GSP33nysu__3u:10625: anena te ye śatamityubhayamekoktyā parāmṛśya sa eka iti śrotriyasyeti ca yathāyogyaṃ pṛthak śataguṇānandatvamucyata ityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__3u:10626: anayaiva rītyā sa ekaḥ pitṝṇāmityādi vājasaneyaśrutivākyamapi vyākhyeyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:10628: devādau yaśca śrotriya ityādinā tacchravaṇānmadhye 'pi yaśca śrotriya ityanuvartanīyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:10634: śrutyuktamabhivīkṣato 'bhivīkṣamāṇasya samyagvicārayato matenaitadeva vyākhyānaṃ yuktaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:10637: evaṃ śrutyā muktau tāratamyamupapādya yuktyāpyupapādayati- yuktaṃ ceti //
GSP33nysu__3u:10638: yuktaṃ ca sādhanādhikyāt sādhyādhikyaṃ surādiṣu // MAnuv_3,4.35ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:10640: surādiṣu mānuṣādibhyaḥ sādhyādhikyaṃ muktigataphalādhikyaṃ sādhanādhikyāddhetoryuktamanumitaṃ cetyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:10643: nādhikyaṃ yadi sādhye syāt prayatnaḥ sādhane kutaḥ // MAnuv_3,4.35cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:10648: yadi devādayo mānuṣādibhyo 'dhikamauktaphalabhājo na syustadā tadadhikatatsādhanārthaprayatnavanto na syuḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:10649: anadhikaphalāya cādhikaṃ prayatnamātiṣṭhamānā na prekṣāvanto bhaveyuriti vipakṣe bādhakānnāprayojako hetuḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:10652: yatnaśca dṛśyate teṣāṃ mahāneva mahātmanām // MAnuv_3,4.36ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:10654: mahātmanāṃ mahāphalabhāktvenānumeyānāṃ teṣāṃ devādīnāṃ mānuṣādibhyo mahānyatno 'dhikaṃ mokṣasādhanānuṣṭhānaṃ ca dṛśyata eva pramāṇaiḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:10661: yatra puruṣe yadapekṣayā sādhanādhikyamastyatra tadapekṣayā sādhyādhikyaṃ ca niyamena dṛṣṭam /
GSP33nysu__3u:10665_0: yastvagnyādhānādiphalānāṃ tāratamyamajānānaḥ kṛṣṭādisthale ca dhānyādau tāratamyaṃ
GSP33nysu__3u:10665_1: kāraṇāntarāyattaṃ na kṛṣṭādisādhanatāratamyādhīnamiti manyamāno dṛṣṭānteṣvapi vipratipadyate
GSP33nysu__3u:10668: yadi loke vede ca sādhanādhikyātsādhyādhikyaṃ no bhavet /

GSP33nysu__3u:10677: evaṃ mānuṣādayo devādibhyo 'lpamuktiphalabhājastadapekṣayālpasādhanavattvādyo yadapekṣayālpasādhanavānsa tato 'lpaphalavāndṛṣṭaḥ yathā sammataḥ /

GSP33nysu__3u:10687: muktairanuṣṭhitaṃ sādhanameva na bhavati sādhyābhāvāditi cet /

GSP33nysu__3u:11080: āpādakaviparyayasya khalvāpādyavipayaryaṃ prati nirvāhakatve bhavetprasaṅgasya viparyayaparyavasānam /

GSP33nysu__3u:12298: yadi viṣṇutvaṃ rāmakṛṣṇādau na jñātaṃ tadā doṣagrāhiṇā pratyakṣeṇa viṣṇoranyo doṣavāniti gṛhītaṃ syāt /

GSP33nysu__3u:12302: yataḥ śrīvatsakaustubhādilakṣaṇena viṣṇutvamanumāya viṣṇurdeṣavāniti pratyakṣeṇa jñāsyata ityata āha- śāstreti //

GSP33nysu__3u:12344: sa ca sarvarūpopetasya viṣṇornirdeṣatvaṃ pratipādayatīti tadvirodhādapramāṇameva doṣaviṣayaṃ pratyakṣamiti /
GSP33nysu__3u:12353: kecittatkālavartinaḥ puruṣā bhagavadrūpeṣu doṣānpaśyantītyatrārthe 'smākaṃ kiṃ pramāṇam /
GSP33nysu__3u:12368: tatpurāṇavākyaṃ taddoṣadarśanaṃ kiṃ pratyakṣalakṣaṇaṃ pramāṇatayā manyate,
GSP33nysu__3u:12375: bhagavadrūpeṣu doṣagrāhiṇīṃ pratītiṃ pramāṇatayā pratipādayatpurāṇavākyaṃ doṣasadbhāvaṃ manyata eva /
GSP33nysu__3u:12376: na hi sambhavati tadgrāhiṇaḥ prāmāṇyamaṅgīkaroti nāṅgīkaroti ca taditi /
GSP33nysu__3u:12377: doṣasadbhāvaṃ manyamānaṃ ca tatprāgudāhṛtayā śrutyaiva viruddhayata iti /
GSP33nysu__3u:12378: purāṇavākyasya śrutiviruddhatve ko doṣa ityata āha- purāṇasyeti //
GSP33nysu__3u:12382: yataḥ kenacitkāraṇena kañcidarthaṃ buddhisthīkṛtya vākyaṃ prayuñjmahe /

GSP33nysu__3u:12426: akṣajaṃ kathameva bhavediti pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇatayābhilaṣitārthe nodbhāvayituṃ śakyate /

GSP33nysu__3u:12442: dṛśyate hyupajīvyasyāpīdaṃ rajatamiti jñānasyopajīvakena nedaṃ rajatamiti jñānena bādha iti cet /
GSP33nysu__3u:12445: pratiṣedhātmakaṃ tu nedaṃ rajatamiti jñānamupajīvakamiti vā,
GSP33nysu__3u:12455: upajīvye 'śodhite parīkṣayāpramāṇādavivikte upajīvakena bādhite na doṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:12464: (astveva) astyevedaṃ rajataṃ nedaṃ rajatamiti jñānayorupajīvyopajīvakabhāva upajīvyasyopajīvakena bādhaśca /
GSP33nysu__3u:12467: parīkṣayā śodhitamupajīvyaṃ virodhyupajīvakaṃ bādhate svayaṃ tena na bādhyata iti /
GSP33nysu__3u:12473: idaṃ rajatamiti jñānaṃ tu na śodhitam /
GSP33nysu__3u:12489: ātyantikaparīkṣaiva bādhakatvopayoginī bhavatu kimupajīvyatvenetyapi na vācyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:12499: yadyapyekamevedaṃ rajatamiti jñānaṃ tathāpi viṣayopādhivaśād vibhāgam /
GSP33nysu__3u:12503: sarvaṃ jñānaṃ dharmiṇi pramāṇaṃ prakāre tu viparyaya iti /
GSP33nysu__3u:12513: asminpakṣe yadupajīvyaṃ na tadupajīvakena bādhyate yacca bādhyate na tadupajīvyamityato nedamasmadīyaniyamabhaṅgasyodāharaṇamiti /
GSP33nysu__3u:12520: yaḥ sarvajña ityādīnāṃ tattvamasyādīnāṃ ca kathamupajīvyopajīvakabhāva iti vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:12523: naca prāptiṃ vinā pratiṣedho 'stīti prāptirūpaṃ yaḥ sarvajña ityādikamupajīvyam,
GSP33nysu__3u:12529: yadbādhyate sārvajñādikaṃ na tadupajīvyamiti na kaścidvirodha iti /
GSP33nysu__3u:12537: tatkathamityataḥ prathamapakṣe tāvadvaiṣamyaṃ darśayati- suparīkṣita iti //
GSP33nysu__3u:12540: prathamapramāṇe suparīkṣite sati na caivamiti sambandhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:12542: idaṃ rajatamiti jñānamupajīvyamapyaparīkṣitatvādupajīvakena nedaṃ rajatamati jñānena bādhyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:12546: yaḥ sarvajña ityādīnāmahaṃ duḥkhītyādīnāṃ ca suparīkṣitatvāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:12547: upapāditaṃ khalu yaḥ sarvajña ityādiśrutīnāṃ tattvāvedakatvaṃ sākṣiṇaśca niyamenāvyabhicāritvamiti /
GSP33nysu__3u:12549: sarvaṃ tadupajīvyaiva pramāṇaṃ vartate yataḥ // MAnuv_3,4.160ef //
GSP33nysu__3u:12552: yataḥ kāraṇāttatsarvaṃ sārvajñādikamupajīvyaiva tattvamasītyādikaṃ pramāṇaṃ pravartate 'to na caivamiti sambandhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:12554: yathā nedaṃ rajatamiti jñānaṃ purovartinaḥ svarūpamātraṃ dharmīkṛtya pravartate na tu rajatatvaviśiṣyaṃ na tathā tattvamasyādivākyaṃ pravartitumarhati /
GSP33nysu__3u:12555: kintu sarvajñatvādiviśiṣyaṃ brahmasvarūpaṃ duḥkhādiviśiṣyaṃ jīvasvarūpaṃ ca dharmīkṛtyaiva /
GSP33nysu__3u:12559: nanu tattvamasyādivākyamapi yadi svarūpamātramupajīvya pravarteta tadā kīdṛśo doṣa ityata āha- kathamiti //
GSP33nysu__3u:12561: vihāya yasmātkasmāccit svarūpasyaiva ced yadi // MAnuv_3,4.161 //
GSP33nysu__3u:12566: dharmānvihāya svarūpasyaivopajīvyatvaṃ cettarhi tatkathaṃ jñeyaṃ yattattvamasīti bodhyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:12573: tathāca na kaściddoṣa ityataḥ śiṣyaṃ vākyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:12574: yadi tattvādidharmopetasyopajīvyatvaṃ tarhi sarvajñatvādikaṃ vihāya yasmātkasmāccittattvādestadbrahmeti kathaṃ jñeyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:12585: nanu nedaṃ rajatamiti jñānaṃ yathā svarūpamātramupajīvya pravṛttam /
GSP33nysu__3u:12586: tathedamapi pravartsyati ko doṣa ityata āha- svarūpasyaiveti //
GSP33nysu__3u:12599: sarvalakṣaṇayuktaṃ tu svarūpaṃ yadi bhaṇyate // MAnuv_3,4.163ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:12602: bhaṇyate tacchabdena iti yadi bhaṇyate ityāvṛttyā yojyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:12607: prativādyuktārthāṅgīkāre pratijñāhāniḥ kathaṃ na bhavedityata āha- na iti //
GSP33nysu__3u:12634: akhilaṃ yogyānvitaṃ svarūpaṃ viśeṣasāmānyatayā śabdabodhyaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__3u:12637: taccaikasya padasya sāmānyata eva na viśeṣata iti na buddhau brahmārohaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:12638: yadi ca viśeṣastadā dharmigrāhivirodhastadavastha eveti samudāyārthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:12643: naca tatrāpi vyāvṛttasyaivopajīvyatvaṃ na svarūpamātrasyetyuktamiti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:12650: vyāvartayanti tadrūpaṃ caitramātrad vinaiva hi // MAnuv_3,4.165 //
GSP33nysu__3u:12664: brahmaṇo nirviśeṣatvād vyāvartayati kiṃ punaḥ // MAnuv_3,4.166ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:12667: kiṃ kartṛ, brahma vyāvartayati, na kimapi /
GSP33nysu__3u:12673: tadedaṃ vākyaṃ siddhasādhanaṃ jñātasyaiva jñāpakaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:12678: vijñānamānandaṃ brahmetyādiśrutyā brahmalakṣaṇatvenoktena cinmātratvādinā tu bhaviṣyatītyata āha- cinmātratvaṃ ceti //
GSP33nysu__3u:12684: cinmātratvādikaṃ na brahmaṇo bhinnam ato nirviśeṣatvāvirodhāttadaṅgīkriyata ityata āha- tāvanmātramiti //
GSP33nysu__3u:12685: tāvanmātraṃ yadīṣyaṃ syāt sarvajñatvaṃ kuto na tat // MAnuv_3,4.167cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:12695: yathā nedaṃ rajatamiti jñāne 'viruddhapurovartitvādyupetasya dharmitvaṃ na viruddharajatatvādyupetasyetyata āha- cinmātreti //
GSP33nysu__3u:12698: cinmātreṇābhedaścinmātrābhedaḥ saḥ sādhyaḥ pratipādyo yasya tattathoktam /
GSP33nysu__3u:12703: taccidaikyaṃ prativādino bodhyasya yata iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:12709: svābhedāṅgīkṛtau cidabhedaḥ kathaṃ siddha ityata āha- cittvamiti //
GSP33nysu__3u:12715: virodhabhayātsarvajñatvādiviśiṣyaṃ na dharmīkriyate iti vadatā cidānandarūpamapi na dharmīkartavyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:12718: cinmātraṃ tvadatiriktaṃ nāstīti vākyārtha iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__3u:12723: na virodhabhayādvayaṃ sārvajñādikaṃ dharmiṇi na niveśayāmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:12742: yatparasāpekṣaṃ tanna sadityaṅgīkāre brahmaṇaścetanatvaṃ ca na syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:12758: jñasya brahmaṇo jñeyaṃ svayameva vā syātparaṃ vā /
GSP33nysu__3u:12760: svajñeyatvaṃ ca naivāsau manyate saviśeṣataḥ // MAnuv_3,4.170ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:12764: kuto na manyata ityata āha- saviśeṣata iti //
GSP33nysu__3u:12766: pratyak parāgbhāvalakṣaṇo hi kartṛkarmabhāvo naikatraikasya yujyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:12767: yadi ca syāttadā bhedapratinidhinā viśeṣeṇa ghaṭanīyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:12769: nivirśeṣaṃ ca brahmāṅgīkṛtamiti svajñeyatvaṃ na manyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:12771: tacca mithyābhūtamiti kathaṃ tadapekṣaṃ cetanatvaṃ satsyāditi /
GSP33nysu__3u:12774: kiñcaivaṃ vadatā svarūpamātramupajīvyamityapi vaktuṃ na śakyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:12787: svaṃ ca tadrūpaṃ ceti hi svarūpam /
GSP33nysu__3u:12789: tena svasminprāpte 'pyucyamānaḥ svaśabdaḥ parisaṅkhayānyāyena paravyāvṛttimeva pratipādayatīti jñāyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:12794: ... svarūpaṃ nāma kiṃ na cet // MAnuv_3,4.170 //
GSP33nysu__3u:12795: na svarūpābhidhāyi syād vaiyarthyaṃ svaravasya yat /
GSP33nysu__3u:12798: asmadabhipretaṃ vyākhyānaṃ na cedaṅgīkriyate tadā svarūpaṃ nāma kiṃ, na kimapi /
GSP33nysu__3u:12800: rūpaśabdasamānārthaḥ svarūpaśabda ityataḥ kathametaditi cedatra vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:12804: yasmādasminpakṣe svaśabdasya vaiyarthyaṃ tasmātsvarūpaṃ nāma kimita sambandhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:12807: nahi rūpaśabdo rūpaśabdārthaṃ nābhidhava iti sambhavati /
GSP33nysu__3u:12815: pratītipramāṇaka eva śabdārthaniścaya iti hi śābdāḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:12822: yaduktaṃ cetanatvaṃ brahmaṇo na syāditi tadiṣyāpādanam /
GSP33nysu__3u:12826: tadarthā eva cetanatvavādā vyākhyātavyā ityataścaitanyamapi na pareṇa śakyāṅgīkāramiti bhāvena tadvayākhyāti- cetanasyeti //
GSP33nysu__3u:12827: cetanasya svabhāvo hi caitanyamiti gīyate // MAnuv_3,4.172ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:12831: iti hi gīyata ityanena guṇavacanabrāhmaṇādibhyaḥ karmaṇi ceti smṛtiṃ sūcayati /
GSP33nysu__3u:12847: parantu mithyeti tatsāpekṣaṃ jñānaṃ kathaṃ satsyāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:12848: brahmaṇo jñānatve jñeyādyupetatā kuta iti cet /
GSP33nysu__3u:12854: na jñeyajñātṛhīnaṃ hi jñānaṃ nāma kvacid bhavet // MAnuv_3,4.173ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:12859: jñeyajñānavihīnaśca jña ityatra ca na pramā // MAnuv_3,4.173cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:12864: nanu prasiddhasya jñānasya jñeyādyupetatve 'pīdaṃ brahmasvarūpaṃ jñānaṃ tadrahitaṃ bhavatu kiṃ bādhakamityata āha- jñātṛjñeyeti //
GSP33nysu__3u:12867: hīnaṃ bhojanameva syāt tāḍanaṃ kartṛtāḍyataḥ // MAnuv_3,4.174 //
GSP33nysu__3u:12870: kartṛ tāḍyata iti tāḍayitṛtāḍyābhyāṃ hīnaṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:12872: ākāṅkṣāvaśātsakarmakatayā pratīyamānamapi ca yadi niṣkarmakaṃ syāttadokto bahutaro 'tiprasaṅgaḥ,
GSP33nysu__3u:12875: nahi sakarmakakriyāyāḥ kartā kriyādirahito yukta iti /
GSP33nysu__3u:12880: akāryaṃ ca brahmākhyaṃ jñānamiti na tasya kartrādyapekṣetyāśayavān śaṅkate- nityatvāditi //
GSP33nysu__3u:12881: nityatvāt tādṛśaṃ ca syāditi cen ... // MAnuv_3,4.175ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:12884: anityasya bhojanāderbhoktrādyapekṣāyāmapīdaṃ nityatvāttādṛśaṃ jñātrādirahitaṃ ca syādityanena vyāpakaviruddhopalabdhyā vyāpyaviparyayaḥ śaṅkitaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:12891: ata eva kaściddhātvarthaḥ karmādyanvitaḥ kaścinneti yujyata ityāśayavānākāṅkṣāmaprayojakīkṛtya kāryatvādyeva prayojakīkurvāṇasyātiprasaṅgamāha- nityeti //
GSP33nysu__3u:12902: kathaṃ na sā tādṛśītyata āha- draṣṭāra iti //
GSP33nysu__3u:12904: draṣṭāro vedavāco hi santi vācyāni cāñjasā // MAnuv_3,4.176ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:12909: nanu santi sthitisamaye vedavāco vasiṣṭhādayo draṣṭāra indrādayaśca vācyāḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:12910: natu mahāpralaya ityata āha- nitya iti //
GSP33nysu__3u:12912: nityo draṣṭā ca vācyaśca bhagavāneva ca svayam // MAnuv_3,4.176cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:12913: na hi vaktṛvihīnā ca vācyahīnāpi vāk kvacit // MAnuv_3,4.177ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:12921: rūpaṃ jñānaṃ vyavahāre jñeyādyanvitamapi paramārthatastadrahitaṃ bhaviṣyatīti pratyāśāṃ vārayitumidaṃ vacanam /
GSP33nysu__3u:12924: jñātṛjñeyavihīnaṃ ca jñānamevaṃ na tad bhavet // MAnuv_3,4.177cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:12930: ākāṅkṣānimittaṃ pratisambandhyanvitatvaṃ nityatvena na hīyata ityetāvanmātre(ṇa)
GSP33nysu__3u:12940: yasmāttasmādevaṃ nityo 'pi jño jñānajñeyavihīno naiva vidyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:12941: śaktiḥ kārakamiti pakṣasya sthitvānnityo vakteti yujyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:12946: kiñca sarvavilopaśca kena mānena gamyate // MAnuv_3,4.179ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:12956: nanu neha nānāsti kiñcanetyāgamasya sadbhāvātkathaṃ viśvamithyātve mānābhāva iti cedatra pṛcchāmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:12957: atra sarvasya mithyātvaṃ pratipādayati vākye sarvāntargatatvenedaṃ vākyametadvākyārthaśca gṛhyate na veti /
GSP33nysu__3u:12959: sarveṇa saha tad vākyāmarthaśca yadi gṛhyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:12960: tadabhāvena sarvasya nāpalāpo bhavet tadā // MAnuv_3,4.179c-f //
GSP33nysu__3u:12965: na gṛhyate ced tannyāyādapalāpo na hi kvacit // MAnuv_3,4.180ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:12976: nanu vākyodāharaṇe kṛte naivaṃvidhaṃ vākyamastīti vā (e)
GSP33nysu__3u:12978: stīti vā nāsya vākyasyātra tātparyamastīti vā vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:12979: anena vikalpanirākaraṇena tu kiṃ kṛtaṃ syādityata āha- upapattīti //
GSP33nysu__3u:12989: atra cāstyupapattivirodha iti jñāpanāya vikalpya dūṣaṇābhidhānaṃ kṛtamiti /
GSP33nysu__3u:12992: tatropapattivirodhe 'pyanyairliṅgairasya vākyasya prapañcamithyātve tātparyamavagamyatāmityata āha- upakramādīti //
GSP33nysu__3u:12997: upakramādiliṅgānāṃ madhye yadyaduttaraṃ tattadbalīya ityupapattireva balīyasī /
GSP33nysu__3u:12998: śrutyādau liṅgasamūhe ca yadyatpūrvaṃ tattadbalīya iti /
GSP33nysu__3u:13000: tato balavadvirodhe satāmanyeṣāṃ liṅgānāṃ na tātparyaniścāyakatvaṃ yuktam /
GSP33nysu__3u:13009: itaśca nāpyasya vākyasya prapañcamithyātve tātparyamāha- pratyakṣamiti //
GSP33nysu__3u:13038: tarhi niravakāśaṃ vākyamapramāṇaṃ prasajyata ityata āha- upapanna iti //
GSP33nysu__3u:13041: pratyakṣādipramāṇopakramādiliṅgāvirodhini tadānukūlyopapanne ca bhagavati svagatabhedābhāve 'rthe vākyasya sati sa evārthaḥ kathaṃ grāhyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:13042: neha nāneti vākyasyāpavyākhyāne nirākṛte labdhamāha- mukhyārtha iti //
GSP33nysu__3u:13043: mukhyārthe vidyamāne tu kva sāvarjñyaṃ niṣiddhayate // MAnuv_3,4.183cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:13046: tasminnavidyamāne tu sāvarjñaṃ na pratiṣeddhuṃ śakyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:13050: ata eva mukhyārthe vākyasya vidyamāne sati /
GSP33nysu__3u:13051: anena prapañcamithyātvāsiddheḥ kva sārvajñaṃ niṣidhyata iti yojanā /
GSP33nysu__3u:13063: yathā yaḥ puruṣaḥ sa sthāṇurityatrāropitena puruṣatvena vyāvṛttaṃ vastu dharmīkṛtya pravṛttāvapi nopajīvyavirodha ityata āha- apalāpo 'pīti //
GSP33nysu__3u:13064: apalāpo 'pi sarvasya na kathañcana yujyate // MAnuv_3,4.184cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:13072: nanu ca tattvamasyādivākyameva jīvabrahmaṇorekatāṃ pratipādayatsārvajñādiguṇajātasya mithyātvaṃ gamayati /
GSP33nysu__3u:13074: tatkathaṃ guṇānāṃ mithyātve pramāṇābhāva iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__3u:13078: anādiyogyatā coktā tena grāhyaiva sarvathā // MAnuv_3,4.185ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:13083: yadā devamānavadānavarūpā tadavāntarabhedarūpā ca jīvānāṃ yogyatānādinityā pramitā tadā kā vārtā jīvabrahmaṇorekatvasya /
GSP33nysu__3u:13084: tathā ca kathaṃ tatsiddhaye guṇānāṃ mithyātvakalpanamiti /
GSP33nysu__3u:13086: muktānāṃ tāratamyaṃ ca mānairuktairna cālyate // MAnuv_3,4.185cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:13096: jñānino 'pi yato nityaṃ kurvanti śubhameva hi /
GSP33nysu__3u:13097: tāratamyaṃ tu muktau ca tenaivādhyavasīyate // MAnuv_3,4.186 //
GSP33nysu__3u:13105: idānīṃ tu jñānena niścitamokṣāṇāmapi śubhāśubhakaraṇaparityāgatāratamyāducyata iti bhedaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:13108: tāratamyaṃ na cenmuktau kutaḥ kuryuḥ śubhaṃ punaḥ // MAnuv_3,4.187ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:13111: yadi brahmādyā muktau tāratamyavanto na syustadā jñānamātreṇa mokṣasya prāptaprāyatvājjñānottarakālaṃ śubhaṃ na kuryuḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:13114: kṛcchreṇāpi tapo jñānaṃ karmāpyete caranti hi // MAnuv_3,4.187cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:13115: bibhyati smāśubhānnityaṃ sakāmāśca śubhe sadā // MAnuv_3,4.188ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:13119: karmeti yajñādi ete jñāninaḥ kṛcchreṇāpītyādiviśeṣaṇānāṃ phalamanupadameva jñāsyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:13120: sakāmāśca śubhe sadetyekasya tapaādeścaraṇakāle tapaādyantaraṃ kāmayanta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:13121: tasmājjñānottarakālānuṣṭhitena vicitreṇa śubhena vicitrāmānandabuddhiṃ prāpnuvantīti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:13128: te hi prāgjñānodayādādaranairantaryābhyāṃ śubhānyanuṣṭhitavantastatsvābhāvyamāpannā jñānodayānantaramapyanutiṣṭhantītyāṅkaya pariharati- naceti //
GSP33nysu__3u:13129: na ca svabhāva evāyaṃ bhayapūrvapravṛttitaḥ // MAnuv_3,4.188cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:13141: ataḥ tatsvabhāvā eva saṃvṛttāra idānīmapi tatsvābhāvyena tathaiva kurvantītyaṅgīkāre ko doṣa ityāśaṅkayāha- tādṛśo 'pīti //
GSP33nysu__3u:13146_0: tatra jñānināṃ śubhapravṛttiḥ pūrvatarapūrvatamasvabhāvabalāyātaiva natu phalavatītyaṅgīkurvāṇaṃ
GSP33nysu__3u:13146_1: prati yadi kaścid brūyāt ajñānināmapi śubhā pravṛttiḥ pūrvatarapūrvamasvabhāvagataiva

GSP33nysu__3u:13814: bhaktiryato yathā svasminnityādyā yuktiratra ca // MAnuv_3,4.234 //
GSP33nysu__3u:13817: vaiṣṇavairdaityādiṣu kriyamāṇe dveṣe vyabhicāraṃ vārayituṃ sadityuktam /
GSP33nysu__3u:13820: atra tu śubhamātrasādhanatvābhāve viśeṣavyāptimevāśritya saddveṣatvamiti mahānbhedaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:13830: iha kramāditi pratijñāyāṃ viśeṣaṇaprakṣepeṇa bhagavadbhaktabhakteḥ kartavyatvaṃ tattāratamyasya cāvaśyakatvaṃ siddhayati /
GSP33nysu__3u:13840: prītidaiva hareryasmād bhaktiḥ sā svopagā yathā // MAnuv_3,4.235 //
GSP33nysu__3u:13857: tadetajjñānakarmādiphalaṃ kiṃ prerakatvāddevānāṃ bhavati uta kartṛtvāddevadattasyeti saṃśaye prathamasūtreṇa devānāmeveti pūrvapakṣayitvā /
GSP33nysu__3u:13859: ityekadeśimatena siddhāntamabhidhāya“sahakāryantaravidhiḥ pakṣeṇa tṛtīyaṃ tadvato vidhyādivat';
GSP33nysu__3u:13861: tatra devānāṃ jñānādiphalamiti pūrvapakṣāṃśo grāhya eva /
GSP33nysu__3u:13870: devadattenānuṣṭhitasya jñānādeḥ phalaṃ devānāṃ bhavatītyekā pratijñā /
GSP33nysu__3u:13871: bhavacca tatkrameṇaiva na tu sāmyena vaiparītyena veti dvitīyā /
GSP33nysu__3u:13873: svātantryatāratamyena phalaṃ hi phalināṃ bhavet // MAnuv_3,4.236cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:13879: anena prathamapratijñāyāṃ svātantryahetuḥ sūcito bhavati yaḥ sūtre svāmipadenoktaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:13881: tathāpi phalaprāptāvuktasya svāmitvahetoḥ sāmarthyena prāptamiti tadapyupapāditam /
GSP33nysu__3u:13882: yadi svātantryāddevadattānuṣṭhitajñānādiphalaṃ devānāṃ syāttarhi tadanuṣṭhitamithyājñānādiphalamapi prasajyetāviśeṣādityata āha- aśubhaṃ tviti //
GSP33nysu__3u:13885: ājñayā cānyagaṃ naiva bhogāya bhavati kvacit // MAnuv_3,4.237 //
GSP33nysu__3u:13887: anyagamaśubhaṃ tveṣāṃ devānāṃ kvacidapi bhogāya na bhavati /
GSP33nysu__3u:13889: hareḥ prītito 'śubhe 'pyeṣāṃ svātantryādbhagavatprasādena maitadasmānprāpaditi nivāraṇe teṣāṃ sāmarthyasadbhāvāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:13891: anyagamiti vadatā svagataṃ tu bhavatīti sūcitam /
GSP33nysu__3u:13898: anena“puṇyamevāmuṃ gacchati na ha vai devānpāpaṃ gacchati';
GSP33nysu__3u:13900: amuṃ saptānnavidyopāsanena prerakatayā parapurapraveśinaṃ parakṛtaṃ puṇyamevāpnoti na pāpam /
GSP33nysu__3u:13911: kāstā yuktaya ityatastā darśayitumāgamavākyaṃ paṭhati- upasaneti //
GSP33nysu__3u:13914: prerayanti hi te jīvān puṇyapāpeṣu nityaśaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:13917: haripūjeti coddeśāt kathaṃ na śubhamāpnuyuḥ // MAnuv_3,4.241 //
GSP33nysu__3u:13927: kiñca te devā vāsudevājñayaiva na tu svecchayā tattatkṛtapūrvakarmānusārata eva /
GSP33nysu__3u:13928: ata evārāgadveṣato rāgadveṣau vinaiva nityaśo jīvānpuṇyapāpeṣu prerayanti hi yasmāttasmātkathaṃ doṣānavāpnuyuḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:13930: pāpādipreraṇena devānāmaśubhaṃ na bhavatītyeva kevalaṃ na,
GSP33nysu__3u:13932: kiñca svavihitaparapreraṇe haripūjeyamiti coddeśātkathaṃ devā na śubhamāpanuyuḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:13942: devā eva hi devānāṃ viśiṣṭā viniyāmakāḥ // MAnuv_3,4.243ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:13953: tatrāpi tāratamye ko heturityata uktam- dravyeti //
GSP33nysu__3u:13955: devānāmanyagaṃ cāpi teṣu yad brahmaṇo 'dhikam // MAnuv_3,4.244 //
GSP33nysu__3u:13958: dravyāṇīndriyādīni teṣu svātantryaṃ dravyasvātantryaṃ vijñānaprayatnau dharmādyutpānanimitte /
GSP33nysu__3u:13970: yasya cā'vāpādau jñānaprayatnādhikyaṃ tasya phalādhikyaṃ dṛśyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:13986: krameṇaiva yathāśakti yathā ye ye prayojakāḥ // MAnuv_3,4.247 //
GSP33nysu__3u:13987: prerakā api pāpānāṃ na devāḥ pāpamāpnuyuḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:13988: iti prakāśikāyāṃ hi provāca harirañjasā // MAnuv_3,4.248 //
GSP33nysu__3u:13992: tasya vivaraṇaṃ ye ye yathā prayojakāstathā tatheti /
GSP33nysu__3u:13996: oṃ sahakāryantaravidhiḥ pakṣeṇa tṛtīyaṃ tadvato vidhyādivat oṃ //
GSP33nysu__3u:13998: ārtvijyam ity auḍulomiḥ tasmai hi parikrīyate / BBs_3,4.45 /
GSP33nysu__3u:13999: sahakāryantaravidhiḥ pakṣeṇa tṛtīyaṃ tadvato vidhyādivat / BBs_3,4.47 /
GSP33nysu__3u:14000: yadyapyevaṃ surāṇāṃ ca daityānāṃ ca mahat phalam /
GSP33nysu__3u:14001: śubhāśubhebhya evañca kartuśca syād yathoditam // MAnuv_3,4.249 //
GSP33nysu__3u:14003: evamuktaprakāreṇa yadyapi śubhāśubhebhyo jñānādibhyo bhavatphalaṃ surāṇāṃ ca daityānāṃ ca bhavatītyupapāditam /
GSP33nysu__3u:14010: kartuḥ phalāṅgīkāre yadu kiñcemāḥ prajā iti sāvadhāraṇaśrutivirodha ātreyavacanavirodhaśca syādityata uktam- mahaditi //
GSP33nysu__3u:14013: kutaḥ kartuḥ phalāṅgīkāra ityata āha- yathoditamita //
GSP33nysu__3u:14021: kartuḥ śubhāśubhaphalasadbhāvādeva mānuṣottamamārabhya devaparyantā daityaparyantāśca nirayādyupabhogina iti yujyate nānyathetyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:14025: iti tattvavivekoktaṃ svayaṃ bhagavatā vacaḥ // MAnuv_3,4.251 //
GSP33nysu__3u:14050: jñānadānaṃ kimāviṣkāreṇa kāryamutānāviṣkāreṇeti saṃśaye pūrvavadatrāpi pūrvapakṣamatyantaheyatvābhāvātprapañcenāṃha- jñānadā apīti //
GSP33nysu__3u:14054: na kevalaṃ śiṣyāḥ kintu jñānadā ācāryā api jñānaphalamāpnuyuḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:14056: ācāryā ityenenaiva siddhe jñānadā iti vacanaṃ jñānadāneneti jñāpanārtham /
GSP33nysu__3u:14061: devāḥ sahasraguṇitaṃ kramāt tasmād yathottaram // MAnuv_3,4.253 //
GSP33nysu__3u:14068: tataḥ paramagurorapare guravaḥ svaśiṣyaphalāpekṣayā sārdhaṃ tāvat adhyardhaṃ phalamāpanuvanti /
GSP33nysu__3u:14089: bhaktiṃ mayi parāṃ kṛtvā māmevaiṣyatyasaṃśayaḥ // MAnuv_3,4.255 //
GSP33nysu__3u:14091: bhavitā na ca me tasmādanyaḥ priyataro bhuvi /
GSP33nysu__3u:14095: yata evaṃ jñānadānaṃ tatsampradāyapravartanaṃ ca mahāphalam /
GSP33nysu__3u:14096: ato bahūnāṃ grahaṇāyāviṣkāreṇa jñānadānaṃ kāryamiti prāpte siddhāntamāha- evamapīti //
GSP33nysu__3u:14100: tathāpi nāviṣkāreṇa kāryaṃ kuta ityata āha- pātramiti //
GSP33nysu__3u:14120: jñānaṃ dṛṣṭaphalaṃ proktaṃ muktiścehaiva labhyate // MAnuv_3,4.257 //
GSP33nysu__3u:14122: prārabdhasya karmaṇo 'virodhenaiva jñānaṃ dṛṣṭaphalaṃ proktamiti prathamādhikaraṇatātparyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:14123: dṛṣṭaṃ ca tatphalaṃ ceti dṛṣṭaphalam śravaṇādisampūrtyanantarameva jñānamutpadyate /
